Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid 0-60 times

Autotk.com offers accurate information on Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid 0-60 times and quarter mile from trusted sources. You may also keep track of how 0-60 times of Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid changed across years and check out the model’s competitors with the same acceleration performance.

Our mission is to present an easy-to-read and comprehensive information on Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid 0-60 mph and quarter mile for the devoted geeks, as it is an essential indicator of the vehicle power.

Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid competitors' 0-60 mph acceleration

  • Tesla Model S 0-60

    • 0-60 2.3 - 4.8 sec

  • Mercedes-Benz E-Class 0-60

  • BMW ActiveHybrid 5 0-60

    • 0-60 5.7 sec
    • quarter mile 14.6 @ 89 mph

It might be difficult to reproduce official Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid 0-60 times driving your own car, as measuring accuracy of Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid acceleration from 0 to 60 depends on the transmission type or such variables as wind, weather conditions, tire traction or even weight of the rim. For the safety of the public, 0-60 times are often recorded by professional drivers on the closed racing tracks or dragstrips.

The good news is you can always soup up your car to have the best drag times. The easiest way is chip-tuning. The Engine of Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid is equipped with an engine management system (EMS)/Engine Control Unit (ECU) which can be modified to different settings, producing different performance levels and boosting Panamera E-Hybrid\'s horsepower.
